pr_title: Fix for Graphql Fragment Error in Debug Mode

timeline.message: Fix for Fragment Error in debug mode

timeline.bodyText: What does this look like?  There is no space - I'd like to see an example log line.
timeline.author: aklish

replies.bodyText:
DEBUG c.y.e.g.PersistentResourceFetcher.logContext - FETCH table[edges] fields with parent GraphQLObjectType<Query>

timeline.bodyText: This might not be safe (there are other types in graphQL besides fields and fragments).  Let's not bother logging the fragment spreads.
